tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_purchases (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  purchase_amount DECIMAL,
  purchase_date DATE,
  reward_points INT
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    reward_points INT NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name TEXT, email TEXT, phone_number TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Purchases (purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, purchase_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2));
CREATE TABLE RewardsPoints (reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, reward_points INT, expiration_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Offers (offer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, offer_name TEXT, discount DECIMAL(5, 2), start_date DATE, end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_offers (
    customer_id INT,
    offer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (offer_id) REFERENCES offers(offer_id),
    PRIMARY KEY(customer_id, offer_id)
);
